about_the_game:
About This Game

In Oh The Humanity, you take on the role of a small extraterrestrial participating in a school field trip to a new theme park inaugurated somewhere in space. The park's theme centers around an ancient race known as humans, who went extinct for unknown reasons. As you explore the park's vast and exciting attractions, you'll discover much about the fascinating and mysterious history of humanity.

Challenging Puzzles:

Test your ingenuity through enigmatic levels as you navigate your rocket, avoiding traps and unlocking doors with switches. Face off against challenging bosses that are replicas of advanced human technology, adding an extra level of excitement and difficulty to your adventure.

Exploration:

Explore each section of the park, each with levels that defy reality. Each level presents its own unique challenge, escalating in difficulty as you progress. To learn more about humans, the park presents you with decoded reviews and new traps based on the technology we knew from them, providing a unique and enriching experience.

Memorable Characters:

Meet the unique characters who control the park. Starting with the extraterrestrial magnate, the park's owner, who created the park with the intention of providing thrilling yet dangerous levels while making a profit. His small AI serves as your personal guide, offering instructions and recommendations to maximize your enjoyment. As you advance, you'll encounter more characters who will enrich your experience and assist you on your journey.

Original Soundtrack:

Enjoy a soundtrack composed exclusively for the game, designed to enhance immersion and the overall experience. Featuring action-packed music meant to raise the adrenaline and keep you on the edge of your seat throughout your adventures.

name: Oh The Humanity!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible con DirectX
  • VR Support: Controladores genéricos USB
  • Additional Notes: Se recomienda una conexión a internet para actualización del juego.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible con DirectX
  • VR Support: Controladores de Xbox 360 y Xbox One, DualShock 4
  • Additional Notes: Se recomienda una conexión a internet para actualización del juego.

short_description: An alien civilization found the remaining ruins of the humans, millions of years after they went extinct. Aliens think humans were vicious, fool and disgusting creatures based on its own research. Almost no technology was found, except some petrified war machines and vehicles.
